plot: Hart laughs it up on set as Segal and company wax poetic about his contributions to the film, Dante's Don King aspirations, and the actor's flurry of verbal blows.
title: In the Ring with Kevin Hart
plot_es: Hart laughs it up on set as Segal and company wax poetic about his contributions to the film, Dante's Don King aspirations, and the actor's flurry of verbal blows.
original_name: In the Ring with Kevin Hart
plot_en: Hart laughs it up on set as Segal and company wax poetic about his contributions to the film, Dante's Don King aspirations, and the actor's flurry of verbal blows.
